tag_list: diamonds, jewelry, grundhauser, gold, wedding, rings, engagement, jewels, gems
overview:
JoAnn Grundhauser is the original founder of Diamonds On Main. She has also been assistant manager for Keepsake Diamonds in Maplewood Mall, Maplewood, MN.

JoAnn has completed the Gemological Institute of America’s hands on Diamond Grading, Colored Sone Identification, Colored Stone Grading, Pearls, Synthetic Diamond Identification, and Counter Sketching Labs. And, she continues to seek further education opportunities through GIA in conjunction with the Independent Jewelers Organization.
